title: Warms You Up!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>C-, c-, c-, cooold! It’s sooo cold~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Uugh, it really is~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>When it’s this cold, won’t it take us a while to warm up with the usual triathlon running?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You’re right. Should we just go all out right from the get-go today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah, let’s do that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright, let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Haaah~, it’s so hot! It feels so good and warm to move your body. Maybe this is the perfect thing to do for winter~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Should we recommend it to the others as well tomorrow then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oooh, good idea! That way, everyone will be all warmed up in an instant~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
